SUPER BOWL XLVII > RAVENS 34, 49ERS 31

Game sets ratings record

The Ravens-49ers battle scored a 48.1 rating and 71 share -- a record for the highest overnight ratings in Super Bowl history, Nielsen reported. (AP, 10:23 a.m.)
  • 49ers' coach Harbaugh blames refs  |  Discuss
  • Pictures Ravens hang on, take Super Bowl
  • 49ers fall to Ravens | Outage left many in dark | Watch
  • Shaughnessy: Lights-out Super Bowl one of best ever
  • pictures Halftime show | Super Bowl celebrities | More
2013 Super Bowl ads | Watch

Awesome, awkward, and awwww

This year's ads included an epic high school prom move, a dad desperate for Doritos, and an irresistible Clydesdale pony. So come on, get happy, and watch the clips.

  • See the winners from last night's Brand Bowl

Remains of King Richard III discovered

Scientists say they have proven ‘‘beyond reasonable doubt’’ that 500-year-old remains found under a parking lot in the city of Leicester, England, belong to King Richard III. (AP, 8:03 a.m.)
  • Discuss Under a parking lot... really?

William Weld won't run for US Senate

The former Massachusetts governor released a statement today announcing he will not run in the special election to succeed John Kerry. (Globe, 10:34 a.m.)
  • Discuss Who do you think will run on the GOP side?
  • Pictures Possible candidates for US Senate

Two teens struck by car in Roxbury

Two teenage girls were hospitalized after they were hit by a car on Malcolm X Boulevard this morning, officials said. (Globe, 9:08 a.m.)

News

At least 8 killed in Calif. bus crash

At least eight people were killed and more than three dozen injured when a bus careened out of control while traveling down a Southern California mountain road, struck a car, flipped and plowed into a pickup, authorities said.
